item.description:
Let's practice Korean with the kids! I have some books that I recently picked up in Korea and found a bunch of fun Korean children's songs on Spotify.

I will make coffee and (if I have time) some Korean snacks (rice & gim, ginger cookies, etc). Please feel free to bring your own snacks to share! Come anytime between 9am-1pm.

If your schedule changes and this is no longer a good time for you to meet, please update your responses in Doodle. Korean moms, click HERE. Mandarin moms, click HERE.
item.name: Korean Playdate
